property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After control of a character changes, put The Bastard of Bolton into play from your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Condition. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the House Bolton trait. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated take control of attached character if it is not under your control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Painted Dogs to choose 1 character. That character gets +2 STR until the end of the phase (+4 STR instead if you have fewer cards in hand than each opponent).

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Each player chooses 1 character he or she controls. Those characters do not stand during the standing phase this round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Robert's Loyalists get +2 STR while attacking any opponent with a non-HB, non-neutral House card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location you control. Attached location gains Vigilant.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raider. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any effect that discards 1 or more cards from an opponent's deck discards an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose 1 location that would kneel to trigger its effect. Copy that ability (paying any additional costs), without kneeling the location.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Queensguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which every attacking character has the Dothraki trait, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Dothraki.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Drogo's Horde by 1 for each Dothraki character you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: During Military challenges, characters cannot be saved.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dothraki character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each character in each opponent's dead pile. If attached character is Rakharo, he also gains Deadly.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Ambush.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which at least 1 Dothraki character attacked, kneel Vaes Dothrak to (choose one): draw 1 card, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand, or move 1 power from the losing opponent's House to your own.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character is killed for Military claim, stand all Dothraki characters in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Brotherhood. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Edric Dayne is killed, choose and discard 1 influence providing location from play. Response: After an influence providing location enters play, kneel that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Southron Vessel to move a gold token from your gold pool to a House Dayne character, or from a House Dayne character to your gold pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Beric Dondarrion cannot be killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Type
property.value: House Card

property.name: Text
property.value: You have no House affiliation. Reduce the gold penalty on out of House character cards you play from your hand or place during setup by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel a Maester or a Learned character to choose and discard 1 attachment from play. Then, if you have no power on your House, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any character with more attachments than each other character in play does not kneel to attack or defend.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins a Military challenge against you, that player takes control of The Bastard's Elite.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Abandoned Fort to return an attacking or defending House Bolton character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Campfire Mime gains the traits of all other characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to stand or kneel 1 Clansman character (up to 2 Clansman characters instead if you have fewer cards in hand than each opponent).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Asshai.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Melisandre participated, move 1 power from any character controlled by the losing opponent to Melisandre. Then, if that was the last power on that character, kill it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Asshai. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Wicked Seductress is knelt, choose and kneel 1 character without an Intrigue icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control at least 3 other Asshai characters, Intolerant Priest gains +1 STR, a Holy crest, and a Military icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a Holy crest and the Asshai trait. If attached character has a printed Holy crest, it gets +1 STR and gains Vigilant.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Storm's End.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which at least 1 Holy character participated, kneel Altar of Fire to look at the losing opponent's hand. Choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel an Asshai character to choose a character that just triggered its ability. Cancel the effects of that ability. Then, if you control at least 3 Asshai characters, you may return the chosen character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Ambitious Oarsman or kneel a Warship location to reduce the cost of the next Raider character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cancel the first location effect triggered by an opponent each round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Queensguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which every attacking character has the Dothraki trait, move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to your own.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dothraki character only. Challenges: If attached character is attacking in a Military challenge, kneel Aggo's Bow to choose and kill 1 defending character. (Cannot be saved if attached character is Aggo.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Ambush.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you kneel Starfall Merchant to pay an influence cost, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a House Dayne character is killed, kneel 2 influence to put another House Dayne character into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Thoros of Myr gains: "Response: Kneel Thoros of Myr and discard a power from a character you control to save a Brotherhood character from being killed."

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Tom Sevenstrings gains: "Response: Kneel Tom Sevenstrings to cancel the effects of an event card just played."

property.name: Text
property.value: If you would claim or move power to your House, you must place it on a Brotherhood character you control instead. Opponents may choose and take power from your Brotherhood characters to fulfill the claim of Power challenges initiated against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, put a Holy character into play from your dead pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Reek participated as an attacker, give the defending player control of Reek to choose and take control of 1 character controlled by that player.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Condition. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR for every House affiliation other than Stark among the cards you control. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to give attached character the House affiliation of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knelt Clansman characters you control cannot be killed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise your Claim value by 1 during any challenge in which The Burned Men is attacking if you have fewer cards in hand than the defending player.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have fewer cards in hand than each opponent, Tyrion's Enforcers can attack or defend Military challenges while knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Clansman character only. Any Phase: Kneel attached character to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Hidden Vale Pass to put a Clansman character into play from your hand, knelt as an attacker during any challenge you have initiated. At the end of the challenge, discard that character from play if it is still in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, knelt Clansman characters you control can be declared as attackers during Military challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Eldon Estermont is attacking, characters with fewer power than him cannot be declared as defenders.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Asshai character only. Setup. Attached character gains deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Island Smuggler to cancel an effect that would move a card out of a player's dead or discard pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Crown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Greyjoy character only. Any Phase: Kneel Driftwood Crown to give attached character one of the following crest and icon pairs until the end of the phase: War and Military ; N and Power ; or Holy and Intrigue .

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have won a single Military challenge as the attacker this phase, you may declare 1 additional Military challenge (to a maximum of 2) by declaring Blood-Crazed Screamer and any number of eligible Dothraki characters as attackers.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The Blood Crazed Screamer must be eligible to participate as an attacker to declare a second Military challenge using its card ability. Oce this effect initiates when the Blood Crazed Screamer's controller wins his first Military challenge as an attacker, the 'to a maximum of 2' card text applies to any additional Military challenge that player would initiate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you have won an Intrigue and a Power challenge as the attacker this phase. Challenges: Kneel any number of standing Dothraki characters to have them each claim 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Lost Spearman from your hand, any opponent may kneel 1 influence to return him to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose and return 1 character you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Lem Lemoncloak gets +1 STR for each Brotherhood character you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Put Lady Stoneheart into play from your dead pile. Then, discard all power from your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot place cards during the setup phase. Other cards you control do not provide a gold bonus. Your House card gains:

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The 'Other cards you control do not provide a gold bonus' text does not apply to the +2 gold gained by your House card from this agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knelt characters cannot be killed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the challenge phase, the active player gains control of Steelshanks' Reserves.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, each time a House Bolton character changes control, that character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player plays the last card from his or her hand, kneel a Clansman character to have Son of the Mist claim 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character is attacking an opponent with more cards in hand than you, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only. Stealth. Immune to events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Massey's Hook to choose and stand 1 character with stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn. Raider.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Euron Crow's Eye is attacking, Raider characters gain stealth and your opponents cannot play events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Return Cragorn to your hand to take 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool and add it to your own.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raider. Ally. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After a card is discarded from a player's deck, kneel Euron's Mongrel or kneel a Warship location to choose and discard 1 copy of that card from play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique character only. Attached character gets +4 STR. Any Phase: Kneel Horn of Dragons to take control of a Dragon character until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Longship Silence to choose 1 attacking Raider character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character card is discarded from an opponent's deck, put that card into play under your control. At the end of the phase, return that character to its owner's discard pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you lose a Military challenge, return Horseback Hunters to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Ambush.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance, kneel The Womb of the World to return a non-unique Dothraki character from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Silent Assassin to stand and remove 1 of your attacking characters from the current challenge. Then, Silent Assassin is considered to be participating in the challenge as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains stealth. Response: After attached character declares stealth, discard the bypassed character from play unless its controller kneels 1 influence or pays 1 gold to the treasury.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, The Mad Huntsman does not kneel to attack or defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, reduce the gold penalty on all characters you play from your hand by 1. Response: After you play a character with an affiliation that does not match any other card you control (including your House card), draw 1 card.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The Any Phase effect should read: 'Response:'

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character is killed, move up to 3 power from that character to another character controlled by the same player. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent as the first player.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: If you won dominance this round, take control of Steelshanks Walton. (Any player may trigger this effect.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a character changes control, stand The Weeping Water. Any Phase: Kneel The Weeping Water to return the topmost House Bolton card in your discard pile to the top of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Tribeless Vagabond an icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Clansman character only. Any Phase: Discard 1 card from your hand to stand or kneel attached character.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is at least 1 card in Shadows, Asshai characters gain a Military icon and get +1 STR for each card in Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge, draw 1 card for each power claimed for renown during that challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Bloodthirsty Crew participated, discard the top 2 cards of the losing opponent's deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Intimidate. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Refurbished Hulk to reduce the cost of the next location you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Limited.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Queensguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: If he is attacking alone, Jhogo gains stealth. Response: After you win a Military challenge in which Jhogo participated, draw 1 card for each attacking Dothraki character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dothraki character only. Challenges: If attached character is attacking, kneel Jhogo's Whip to stand and remove a character from the current challenge. (Up to 2 characters instead if attached character is Jhogo.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Ambush.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sand Snake characters you control gain an Intrigue icon and stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sand Snake characters you control gain a Military icon and Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, discard Bastard Daughter from play to put a unique Sand Snake character into play from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Martell character only. Attached character gains the Sand Snake trait and 'Sand Snake characters you control get +1 STR'

property.name: Text
property.value: Your characters with Weapon attachments you control get +2 STR and gain Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge in which at least 1 Sand Snake character participated, kneel 1 influence to look at an opponent's hand. Discard 1 event card from that hand, if able.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Jack-be-Lucky gains: "Dominance: Discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Orphaned Recruit enters play, move 1 power from any player's House card to Orphaned Recruit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose 1 participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each power you have that is not on your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player loses a challenge, that player must reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roose Bolton does not kneel to attack during Intrigue challenges. Response: After you win a challenge in which Roose Bolton participated, all players take control of each character they own currently in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins a Power challenge against you, that player gains control of The Flayed Men.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins an Intrigue challenge against you, that player takes control of Bolton Loyalist.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon. House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Bolton character only. Setup. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Bloody Scourge to choose and discard 1 kneeling character from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play or take control of a House Bolton character with STR 3 or higher, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player takes control of a House Bolton character, kneel 1 influence to kill that character and another character of equal or lower printed cost controlled by the same player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knelt Clansman characters you control can be declared as defenders during Military challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Mountain Camp to reduce the cost of the next Clansman character you play this phase by 2. That character comes into play knelt.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel a Holy character to put Knight of Summerhall into play from your dead pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Asshai character only. Response: After attached character is killed, search your deck for another Asshai character of equal or lower printed cost and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raider. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Euron's Enforcers get +1 STR for each Raider character you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Intimidate. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a Power challenge in which at least 1 Raider character participated, discard the top X cards of the losing opponent's deck. X is the amount by which you won the challenge. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dothraki. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Dothraki Handmaiden to choose an attacking Dothraki character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Dragon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Black Hatchling from play any time you control Drogon. Black Hatchling cannot defend.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sand Snake characters you control gain a Power icon and vengeful.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Sand Snake character is killed, kneel 1 influence to search your deck for 1 Sand Snake character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. (Kneel 3 influence to search for any number of Sand Snake characters and put them into play instead if The Red Viper was just killed.) Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no power on your House card, Anguy the Archer gains: "Response: After an opponent's character is killed, Anguy the Archer claims 1 power (limit 3 per phase)."

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Stoney Sept to choose and return 1 Brotherhood character you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +1 STR and cannot have its STR lowered by card effects. If attached character is Beric Dondarrion, he gains: 'After Beric Dondarrion claims power for renown, he claims 1 additional power.'

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, kneel all non-unique characters in play.
